Common Helpers.name: compareDesc

Common Helpers.summary: Compare the two dates reverse chronologically and return -1, 0 or 1.

isAfter

Common Helpers.name: isValid
Common Helpers.description:
Returns false if argument is Invalid Date and true otherwise.
Invalid Date is a Date, whose time value is NaN.

Time value of Date: http://es5.github.io/#x15.9.1.1

exceptions.description: Argument must be an instance of Date

Common Helpers.name: isValidDateValues
Common Helpers.description:
Validates that the given values are within acceptable ranges,
e. g. the hour value should be within range [0..23], the second value within [0..59] etc.

params.description: the day of the month of the date
params.name: day

Common Helpers.summary: Is the date constructed from the given values exist?

Common Helpers.name: max
Common Helpers.description: Return the latest of the given dates.
Common Helpers.summary: Return the latest of the given dates.

Common Helpers.name: min
Common Helpers.description: Return the earliest of the given dates.
Common Helpers.summary: Return the earliest of the given dates.

Common Helpers.name: parse
Common Helpers.description:
Parse the date string representation.
It accepts the ISO 8601 format as well as a partial implementation.

ISO 8601: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601

params.description: the ISO 8601 formatted string to parse
params.name: dateStr

returns.description: parsed date in the local time zone.

Range Helpers.name: isWithinRange
Range Helpers.description: Is the given date within the range?

returns.description: the date is within the range

Range Helpers.summary: Is the given date within the range?

exceptions.description: End of range must have time value greater than time value of start of range

params.description: the amount of ISO week-numbering years to be added
params.name: amount

returns.description: new date with the ISO week-numbering years added

ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.summary: Add the specified number of ISO week-numbering years to the given date.

ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.name: differenceInCalendarISOYears
ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.description:
Get the number of calendar ISO week-numbering years between the given dates.

ISO week-numbering year: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_week_date

returns.description: number of calendar ISO week-numbering years

ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.summary: Get the number of calendar ISO week-numbering years between the given dates.

ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.name: differenceInISOYears
ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.description:
Get the number of full ISO week-numbering years between the given dates.

ISO week-numbering year: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_week_date

returns.description: number of full ISO week-numbering years

ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.summary: Get the number of full ISO week-numbering years between the given dates.

ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.name: endOfISOYear
ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.description:
Return the end of an ISO week-numbering year,
which always starts 3 days before the year's first Thursday.
The result will be in the local timezone.

ISO week-numbering year: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_week_date
ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.summary: Return the end of an ISO week-numbering year for the given date.

ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.name: getISOWeeksInYear
ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.description:
Get the number of ISO weeks in an ISO week-numbering year of the given date.

ISO week-numbering year: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_week_date

returns.description: number of ISO weeks in a year

ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.summary: Get the number of weeks in the ISO week-numbering year.

ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.name: getISOYear
ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.description:
Get the ISO week-numbering year of the given date,
which always starts 3 days before the year's first Thursday.

ISO week-numbering year: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_week_date

ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.name: isSameISOYear
ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.description:
Are the given dates in the same ISO week-numbering year?

ISO week-numbering year: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_week_date

returns.description: the dates are in the same ISO year

ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.summary: Are the given dates in the same ISO week-numbering year?

ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.name: isThisISOYear
ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.description:
Is the given date in the same ISO week-numbering year as the current date?

ISO week-numbering year: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_week_date

returns.description: the date is in this ISO week-numbering year

ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.summary: Is the given date in the same ISO week-numbering year as the current date?

ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.name: lastDayOfISOYear
ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.description:
Return the last day of an ISO week-numbering year,
which always starts 3 days before the year's first Thursday.
The result will be in the local timezone.

ISO week-numbering year: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_week_date
ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.summary: Return the last day of an ISO week-numbering year for the given date.

ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.name: setISOYear
ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.description:
Set the ISO week-numbering year to the given date,
saving the week number and the weekday number.

ISO week-numbering year: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_week_date

params.description: the ISO week-numbering year of the new date
params.name: isoYear

returns.description: new date with the ISO year setted

ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.name: startOfISOYear
ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.description:
Return the start of an ISO week-numbering year,
which always starts 3 days before the year's first Thursday.
The result will be in the local timezone.

ISO week-numbering year: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_week_date
ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.summary: Return the start of an ISO week-numbering year for the given date.

ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.name: subISOYears
ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.description:
Subtract the specified number of ISO week-numbering years from the given date.

ISO week-numbering year: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_week_date

params.description: the amount of ISO week-numbering years to be subtracted
params.name: amount

returns.description: new date with the ISO week-numbering years subtracted

ISO Week-Numbering Year Helpers.summary: Subtract the specified number of ISO week-numbering years from the given date.
